name: xray
description: Kaholo Plugin for Xray Test Management App for Jira.

params.name: clientId
params.description: API Key Client ID for authentication to Xray

params.name: clientSecret
params.description: API Key Client Secret for authentication to Xray

params.name: executionResultsDocument
params.description: A JSON document containing the test results to import

params.name: executionResultsDocument
params.description: A JSON document containing the test results to import

params.name: projectKey
params.description: Key of the project where the test execution (if the Test Execution Key parameter wasn't provided) and the tests (if they aren't created yet) are going to be created

params.name: testPlanKey
params.description: Key of the Test Plan. If you specify the Test Plan, the Tests will be added automatically to the Test Plan if they're not part of it

params.name: testEnvironments
params.description: A string containing a list of test environments separated by ";"

params.name: revision
params.description: Source code and documentation version used in the test execution

params.name: fixVersion
params.description: The Fix Version associated with the test execution (it supports only one value)

params.name: executionResultsDocument
params.description: An XML document containing the test results to import

params.name: infoProject
params.description: The project ID of the Jira project containing the Xray Test issue

params.name: infoSummary
params.description: A text summary of the test result
params.placeholder: automated integration test result JP2032 - PASSED in 2m32s

params.name: infoDescription
params.description: A text description of the test result

params.name: infoTestEnvironments
params.description: A list of test enviornments as configured in Xray, one per line

params.name: infoTimestamp
params.description: A time representing both start and finish time of the test.

params.name: infoUser
params.description: The name of the Jira user associated with this test result

params.name: testComment
params.description: Text commentary regarding the test result
params.placeholder: Automated test updated to accomodate changed made by APP-2388.

params.name: testStatus
params.description: The status of the test execution being created

params.name: testAssociatedTest
params.description: The Jira item number of the Test to which the Test Execution is related
